===== Publishing the minutes =====

Once the meeting is over, minutes are prepared to summarized the outcome of the meeting.
 1. Create a new entry in <nowiki>[[MeetingLogs-OpenStackCharms]]</nowiki>/YYYYMMDD with the <nowiki>[[OpenStackCharmsMeetingLogTemplate]]</nowiki>.
   a. Move the agenda from <nowiki>[[ServerTeam-OpenStackCharmsMeeting]]</nowiki> to agenda section.
   a. Copy the irc logs to the Irc log section (See http://irclogs.ubuntu.com/ ). 
   a. Update <nowiki>[[ServerTeam-OSCharmHeader]]</nowiki> to announce the next meeting date.
   a. Write the minutes.
   a. Update the Agenda for the next meeting at <nowiki>[[ServerTeam-OpenStackCharmsMeeting]]</nowiki>
      a. In particular, remove completed ACTIONS, add new ones
   a. Update the list of Chair/Scribes
      a. move yourself to the back
      a. send an email to the person who will chair next week
